named-query.name: BC_READ_ACTIVE_CUSTOMER_PHONES_BY_CUSTOMER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT cp FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.CustomerPhone cp WHERE cp.customer.id = :customerId AND cp.phone.isActive = TRUE ORDER BY cp.id

named-query.name: BC_FIND_DEFAULT_PHONE_BY_CUSTOMER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT cp FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.CustomerPhone cp WHERE cp.customer.id = :customerId AND cp.phone.isDefault = TRUE

named-query.name: BC_READ_ALL_CUSTOMER_PHONES_BY_CUSTOMER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT cp FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.CustomerPhone cp WHERE cp.customer.id = :customerId ORDER BY cp.id
